participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Samantha loves exploring the outdoors and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: i've a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.
